text: Sokode kare wa hakobune o tsukuri hajimeta. Kare no min no shucho-tachi wa, sono-gawa o sugiru tabi ni kare o chosho shita. Kare wa itta. `Tatoe anata gataga (ima) watashi-tachi o chosho shite mo, izure anata gataga chosho suru yo ni, kitto watashi-tachi ga anata gata o chosho suru yo ni naru
